title: Kalitsa passive
body: Just played a game as Kalista post the 5.1 patch. Her jump was going off maybe once out of every 10 attacks. It would go off every time Q was used but no matter how i tried to get the jump to go off during combat it would either have no reaction of she would just walk away after the attack was made. Possible bug?

replies.body: Yeah, there's an issue we're looking into at the moment where Kalista's passive isn't spending as much time listening for an input command as it should. Definitely not an intended change.

Kallista's Sentinel Ability Passive for laning partner needs a code strand that see's if Laning partner has a relic shield execution charge available. Laning partner and Kallista will be much more happy in the end term, also lets the Tankier Supports that Kallista has grown to love play a little more aggressive and tactically.

Sentinel Passive Code (charge:yes:else)[yes:relic shield execution]{else:sentinel passive}

Yes but it will be a problem if the targon execution works on champions. For the moment it requires coordination, it could be hard to fix.

I do believe you could add an easy tag such as
Target:Champion=Yes(else:handle=false)

Like i said in posts before It has been awhile since I touched a code system and my last was a heavily modified C# var

Any possibility we could get this kind of thing documented on the Service Status page, so we can see it in client?

Maybe this bug isn't worth disabling Kalista for, but I think Kalista players would like to know that she's bugged before they head into game with her (especially ranked).
Where can we check to see if this is fixed?
Thanks dude, pleased to know it is not a ninja nerf :)
This response literally made my entire day, thanks for the update :).
SO. I'm just saying, Kalista is broken. That is all. Like, overpowered busted. It's craaazy. I love her.
